text:
paqriqBUraqgniM pa#riqBUrindra#M pariqBUrviSvA$n dEqvAn pa#riqBUrmA(gm) saqha bra#hmavarcaqsEnaq sa na#H pavasvaq SaM gavEq SaM janA#yaq Samarva#tEq Sa(gm) rA#jaqnnOSha#dhIqByO &cCi#nnasya tE rayipatE suqvIrya#sya rAqyaspOSha#sya dadiqtAra#H syAma | 
tasya# mE rAsvaq tasya# tE BakShIyaq tasya# ta iqdamunmRu#jE || 
prAqNAya# mE varcOqdA varca#sE pavasvA pAqnAya# vyAqnAya# vAqcE - [  ]   7
